t: Vindicate*pn me, God, and champion my cause against*ln an unfaithful nation; rescue*ln me from the deceitful and unjust person.
For*ln you are the God of my refuge. Why*ln have you rejected me? Why*ln must I go about in sorrow because*ln of the enemyâ€™s oppression?
Send*pn your light and your truth; let them lead me. Let*ln them bring me to your holy mountain, to*ln your dwelling place.
Then*ln I will come to the altar of God, to*ln God, my greatest joy. I*ln will praise you with the lyre, God,*ln my God.
Why,*pn my soul, are you so dejected? Why*ln are you in such turmoil? Put*ln your hope in God, for I will still praise him, my*ln Savior and my God.
